3 PTPTrajectory::PTPTrajectory(Eigen::Affine3d startPoint, Eigen::Vector3d RCM, Eigen::Vector3d firstPoint, Eigen::Vector3d secondPoint, int speed, double cycleTime)
4 {
5  cycleTime_ = cycleTime;
6 
7  startPositionTrajectory_ = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
8  startPositionTrajectory_.translate(RCM);
9  startPositionTrajectory_.translate(firstPoint);
10  endPositionTrajectory_ = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
11  endPositionTrajectory_.translate(RCM);
12  endPositionTrajectory_.translate(secondPoint);
13 
14  speed_ = speed;
15  currentPosition = startPoint;
16  startPosition_ = startPoint;
17 }
18 
19 Eigen::Affine3d PTPTrajectory::calculateNextPoint()
20 {
21  // Movement from the current position to the start position of the trajectory
22  if(pathParameterStart_<=1)
23  {
24  currentPosition.translate((startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation())/(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_*cycleTime_);
25  pathParameterStart_ += cycleTime_/(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_;
26  return currentPosition;
27  }
28  if(pathParameter_<=0)
29  {
30  pathIncrement = cycleTime_/(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_;
31  }
32  if(pathParameter_>=1)
33  {
34  pathIncrement = -cycleTime_/(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_;
35  }
36  currentPosition.translate((endPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPositionTrajectory_.translation())*pathIncrement);
37  pathParameter_ += pathIncrement;
38  return currentPosition;
39 }
